text: "To Surveil with Love" is the 20th episode of The Simpsons 21st Season. In this episode, Homer leaves his bag at the train station and after it is thought to be a terrorist attack, cameras are put up around Springfield. Meanwhile, Lisa is bullied at school for being a blonde. It aired on May 2, 2010. This is first episode to feature characters without shadows, first time since "He Loves to Fly and He D'ohs". Category:The Simpsons episodes Category:2010 television episodes
title: To Surveil with Love
